name: NextRace
0:
”Alexa, open next race”
”next race”
”when is the next race”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: next race
des:
This Alexa skill helps users learn more about an upcoming F1 race.

You'll learn its name, location, and the time (days, hours, minutes, and seconds) remaining until it starts.

After invoking the skill (Alexa, open Next Race), simply ask Alexa "when's the next race." From there, you'll receive the information through your device.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
